articles.title: Clash over whether U.S. officers can be armed in Canada keeps Nexus offices closed - CTV News
articles.description: A dispute over legal protections for American customs officers has kept Nexus enrolment centres closed in Canada more than three months after they reopened south of the border -- due in part to a clash over U.S. agents' right to carry guns on Canadian soil.

articles.title: Sprinter Noah Lyles sets American record in 200 meters, wins world title in 19.31 seconds as U.S. men take top 3 spots at track and field championships - ESPN
articles.description: Noah Lyles won the world title in the 200 meters at the track and field championships. His time of 19.31 seconds bested Michael Johnson's American record of 19.32, set in 1996.
